about_the_game:
Emit light energy aided by a robotic companion to re-grow plants across diverse ecosystems.

Climb, jump and slide to navigate and interact with the unique biology of charismatic megaflora.

Imbue energy into the landscape with the help of regenerative ecotech machinery. 

Preserve rare plant species collected from secret, hidden refugia scattered across biomes.

Re-activate machinery for ecological engineering to harness latent plant energy and revitalize ecosystems.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Biophyllia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:

short_description: Regrow gigantic plants and trees across diverse ecosystems. Imbue energy into the landscape with the help of regenerative ecotech machinery. Explore and regenerate a forgotten region abandoned after ecological collapse.
